Articles.Content: TheWinterOwl, White Owl, or just Matt - You can call him by all of these names but the point is Matt has been a Youtuber covering KSP for many years now. As a former airline pilot he usually focuses his videos around building and flying aircraft of various descriptions, but his latest project is both something completely different and very much worth watching. Enjoy!
Hmm. Could you always walk over the ledge of the VAB like that, or did I see a sneak peak of a future feature?

While greatly flattered by the attention (Yay, I love you guys!) I need to make one correction: I was never an airline pilot, and do not have anywhere close to that much flight experience. I hold a Commercial Pilot certificate and thus could in theory be paid to fly airplanes, however that has never been my job. I spent a whole lot more time turning wrenches, inspecting and repairing airplanes, than I did piloting them.

And a suggestion, if I may. This video is probably a better introduction to the current series: 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/00Sa4VB4bWY?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Thanks for the notice. I love KSP. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I like Kerbal walking into the monolith and then the pull away of the Kerbal running from it after his creepy encounter. I like how you put the dialogs together as well. I'll be recommending this series to my son.

Good stuff.
